item.title: Our Products
item.description:
🛍 Our Products

We offer high-quality items that combine great design with everyday usability. Below is a selection of our current products.

🎧 Smart Noise-Cancelling Headphones

Price: $199
Description: Experience crystal-clear sound with active noise cancellation, up to 30 hours battery life, and sleek, comfortable ear cups.

🖋 Luxury Fountain Pen

Price: $45
Description: Elegant brass body with fine nib for smooth writing. Perfect for journaling, signing, or gifting.

☕ Portable Coffee Maker

Price: $79
Description: Brew barista-quality coffee anywhere. Compact, durable, and easy to clean.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

99 Lakh Studios built these apps (99 Match, Ijome) as a Freemium app. This service is provided by 99 Lakh Studios at no cost and is intended for use as is.

This page informs visitors of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information for anyone who chooses to use our Service.

By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Personal information we collect is used to provide and improve the Service. We will not share your information with anyone except as described here.

item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description:

item.title: How to Delete Your Account
item.description:
How to Delete Your Account in the Ijome Game App

Follow these steps to delete your account:

  1. Open the app and go to Play after the Login.
  2. Go to Profile tab.
  3. Tap on Delete Account.
  4. Confirm your choice.

Note: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
